ptp:process-type.name: Library Normalization and Pooling Check (Nanopore) McGill

field-definition.name: Library volume (uL) transferred to DESTINATION plate

parameter.name: 2. Create CSV file for Excel Library Normalization
Copy Library Volume
parameter.string: bash -l -c "/opt/gls/clarity/bin/java -jar /opt/gls/clarity/extensions/ngs-common/v5/EPP/ngs-extensions.jar -i {stepURI:v2:http} -u {username} -p {password} script:evaluateDynamicExpression -t false -h false -exp 'output.::Library Volume (ul)::=input.::Library Volume (ul):: ' -log {compoundOutputFileLuid2}"

parameter.name: Test 1
parameter.string: bash -l -c "/opt/gls/clarity/bin/java -jar /opt/gls/clarity/extensions/ngs-common/v5/EPP/ngs-extensions.jar -i {stepURI:v2:http} -u {username} -p {password} script:evaluateDynamicExpression -t true -h false -exp 'output.::Library Concentration (nM):: = input.::Concentration:: ; output.::Library Volume To Use (ul):: = (step.::Target Concentration (nM):: * step.::Target Volume (ul)::) / input.::Concentration:: ; output.::Diluent Volume (ul):: = step.::Target Volume (ul):: - output.::Library Volume To Use (ul):: ; if (output.::Library Volume To Use (ul):: > step.::Maximum Library Volume Threshold (ul)::) {output.::Denaturation Sample Volume (ul):: = step.::Target Concentration (nM):: / input.::Concentration:: * 4.36} else {output.::Denaturation Sample Volume (ul):: = 4.36} ; if (output.::Library Volume To Use (ul):: > step.::Maximum Library Volume Threshold (ul)::) {output.::EB Volume (ul):: = 6.2 + 4.36 - output.::Denaturation Sample Volume (ul)::} else {output.::EB Volume (ul):: = 6.2} ' -log {compoundOutputFileLuid2}"

field-definition.name: Clusters on Index in Lane from Target (%)
On Bait Bases from On Target Bases (%)
Top Sample Tag Rate from All Detected (%)
Top Sample Tag Rate from Total (%)

process-output.output-name: {LIST:Index Validation Report,CSV File for pipeline,Library Volume update log File,Excel file for LIMS}

ptp:process-type.process-type-attribute: Display and maximize the Input/Output Explorer mini-tabbed page

ptp:process-type.name: Run Setup (Nanopore) McGill

parameter.name: Generate bcl2fastq Sample Sheet
parameter.string: bash -c "/opt/gls/clarity/bin/java -jar /opt/gls/clarity/extensions/ngs-common/v5/EPP/ngs-extensions.jar -u {username} -p {password} -i {processURI:v2} script:setUDF -f 'Progress' -t '//input/@uri->//sample/@uri' -v 'Library ready for sequencing' script:initArtifactUDFs && /opt/gls/clarity/bin/java -jar /opt/gls/clarity/extensions/ONT_HiSeqX/v1/EPP/hiseqx-extensions.jar script:generate_bcl2fastq_sample_sheet -u {username} -p {password} -i {processURI:v2} -c {compoundOutputFileLuid1} -e {compoundOutputFileLuid2}"

ptp:process-type.process-type-attribute: Display the UDF information associated with all the outputs

ptp:process-type.name: Sequencing (Nanopore) McGill

parameter.name: 4. Run Processing UDF validation
parameter.string: bash -c "/opt/gls/clarity/bin/java -jar /opt/gls/clarity/extensions/ngs-common/v5/EPP/ngs-extensions.jar -i {stepURI:v2} -u {username} -p {password} script:evaluateDynamicExpression -exp 'if ( !step.::Run Processing Status::.matches(::Complete::)){fail ( ::Run is not completed. Please wait and try again.:: ) }' -log {compoundOutputFileLuid8} -t true "
